info.name: CS Department Automated Information Timeline
info.description:
This is a Postman Workspace for the CSI 5324 project team, The Incredibles, to build and test our API. Team members consist of:

- Sarah Faron
- Pawan Bhandari
- Tim Klimpel
- Matt Hays
